DOC.criteria: ASAStatus 1 Complete permanent dentition Bitewing radiography already exist ( < 4 month ) Minimum one cavitationfree approximal surface , symptomless , interproximal enamel dentin caries lesion posterior teeth without restoration and/or sound tooth surface . Children young 15 Years
